metadata.name: Arrow Head Mountain
metadata.description:
Arrow Head Mountain, the name given to Kirkjufell by the TV series Game Of Thrones, is one of the most photographed mountains in the country of Iceland. 

The mountain appears in the opening scene of the popular TV series Game Of Thrones and has helped inspire me to explore Iceland's surreal and fantastical landscape.

I had always wanted to visit Kirkjufell and photograph it, but I had no idea how amazing it would look in different seasons and lighting conditions. I was amazed by how different it can appear in winter compared to summer or even autumn and even more blown away by how incredible it looked when lit up by the setting sun.

I decided to try a different angle and shoot from down at the lower falls. This provided an entirely new perspective on the mountain and created an image I will never forget.
